title: Head of Marketing
skills: Deep knowledge of media planning & brand management finely blended with strong strategic & analytical skills. Visionary yet practical professional.

primary.name: Школа менеджмента Audenica, г. Нант, Франция
primary.result: Маркетинг для продуктовых менеджеров  (Marketing for product managers major)

primary.name: Московский государственный институт международных отношений Министерства иностранных дел Российской Федерации, Москва

experience.description:
– Developing marketing strategy, setting and achieving business and brand KPIs
– Managing cross-functional teams: IT, Call Center, Marketing, Operations, SMM, Creative and other. More than 30 people in charge.
– Managing in-depth interviews with clients, searching insights for marketing campaigns and new products
– Turn-key brand buildng: from interviews to new product launches
– Analyzing and presenting results to the CEO

Achievements:
1. My test assignment was used as a basis for new brand platform. (can send it upon request)
2. Devised, launched two major marketing campaigns: "Гроу Фуд – это просто. Попробуй за за 990" and "День неготовки" with "Квартет И" as ambassadors. Both campaigns hit all-time records in brand (ABA, SBA) and business KPIs (new clients, turnover)
3. Gained trust from the team. This one is crucial for me.

– Developing 2019, 2020 advertising campaign strategies, setting and achieving business and brand KPIs
– Developing Modulbank 2020 positioning: from face-to-face interviews to the “big idea”
– Managing quantitative and qualitative studies, searching for clients’ insights for strategy and creatives
– Working in digital: launching YouTube integrations, banner ads, CPA sites
– Analyzing market and media environment, presenting overviews to top management
– Designing and prototyping new products: customer interviews, building CJM and MVP («Модульсвязи»)

Achievements:
1. 2019 ad campaign results: 100% plan realization in SBA, 160% realization in ABA, best in category awareness growth among SME banks as of 1HY 2019 (O+K Research, 2019 report)
2. 3 mio rur cost optimization in 2019-2020 on offline media agencies fees
3. Participating in Adindex City Conference 2019 panel session «Рекламные тендеры. Доколе?», 100 offline participants. >50 000 views online

– Lexus full scope offline media planning: TV, Radio, OOH, Fuel stations, Airports
– Teaching junior media planner TV and Radio media planning, delegating and controlling tasks
– Participating in building and fine-tuning econometric models predicting traffic to dealer centers
– Making and presenting competitive media overviews for client’s team (10+ participants)

Achievements:
1. TV, Radio, OOH media budget totaling in >100 mio rur approved by the client
2. Match TV, Russia 24 affinity prognosis improved by 10-15% on average
3. Database preparation for competitive overviews automatization (from ~5 to 2 working days needed)

- Imopheraza and Longidaza brands media planning from client’s brief to campaign launch
- Polyoxidonium document flow, analyzing and reporting on current campaigns
- Managing clients’ analytical requests on media, market, competitors
- Translating special projects for client (Mitsubishi project, pajerosport.rbc.ru, RU-EN)

industries.name: Маркетинговые, рекламные, BTL, дизайнерские, Event-, PR-агентства, организация выставок

- Offline media planning with the help of media planner
